hero.description: I create elegant, intuitive, and high-performance web experiences with great attention to detail

paragraphs.first: As a web and mobile web development student, I am progressively building my expertise by combining technical rigor and active curiosity. After two initial training periods in 2016 and 2019, I returned to coding with a strong will to professionalize.
paragraphs.second: I am deeply learning the fundamental languages of the web: HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Currently, I am interested in web animations, which I explore as a way to bring dynamism to interfaces while preserving performance.
paragraphs.third: Code-oriented above all, I aim to develop clean, maintainable, and accessible interfaces with a strong sense of structure and clarity. My current goal is simple: obtain my diploma while consolidating my foundations and experimenting whenever possible on personal projects.
